article_title: Coronavirus Has Created a Sex Boom—but Maybe Not a Baby Boom
article_description: Isolated couples are purchasing toys by the bucketload  and activity on dating apps is way up  But more babies might not be on the way
article_content: The clubs are shut  The pubs are shut  Tinder dates are canceled  One night stands are practically illegal  But  despite these obvious hurdles  coronavirus has still created a sex industry sales boom   This story originally appeared on WIRED UK Lelo  a Swe   3359 chars
